meanings.definition: The process of vertical movement of the Earth's crust.
meanings.sent1: Epeirogeny can cause mountains to form over millions of years.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study epeirogeny to understand how continents change shape.
meanings.sent3: The slow dance of epeirogeny made the Earth's crust look like a wrinkled blanket.
meanings.sent4: The epeirogeny of the land was like a gentle breath shaping the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The power of epeirogeny sculpted the world we see today.

meanings.definition: The gradual uplift or subsidence of large land masses.
meanings.sent1: Epeirogeny can lead to the formation of vast plains.
meanings.sent2: The epeirogeny of the continent created deep valleys and high plateaus.
meanings.sent3: The epeirogeny of the land was like a slow-motion rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: The epeirogeny of the land was a silent but powerful force shaping the terrain.
meanings.sent5: The epeirogeny of the land whispered tales of ancient movements.
